alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 7:52AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama and Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Blowing snow may create areas of reduced visibilities over ridgetops and open areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
